channel.title: [PI] Need Somebody To Make My Client A Jar, I Tried and Failed a LOT! [PI] 317
channel.description:
I need somebody to make my client a jar. I don't know what I'm doing wrong. I've followed many tutorials on the internet and I'm still getting "Cannot find main-class: client" when I run the newly jarred and signed client.. Can anyone help me? I have teamviewer, MSN, and Skype.
Source and Client is: ErasedPkz
Thanks in advance to anyone who helps!!!
